parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Particles </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Updates particle source, creates particles in circle with given radius. Velocity is transformed and added to total velocity. Correspondence between CfgCloudlets class param names and command array of params:
<code>particleSource [[setParticleCircle]]
[
	circleRadius,
	circleVelocity
];</code> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> particleSource '''setParticleCircle''' [radius, velocity] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> particleSource: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [radius, velocity]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> radius: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> velocity: [[Array]] (x,y,z) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setParticleParams]], [[setParticleRandom]], [[ParticleTemplates]], [[setParticleClass]], [[particlesQuality]], [[setParticleFire]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
